title: ğŸ“£Announcement Of 'Harry's House'ğŸ“£
snippet: Harry has finally announced his third studio album, Harryâ€™s House, releasing in May 20. Hereâ€™s all we know about the highly-anticipated albumâ€¦
content:
Grammy-winning artist Harry Styles announced on social media Wednesday (March 23, TODAY!) that his highly anticipated third studio album, Harryâ€™s House, will arrive May 20th.

According to the press release, Harryâ€™s House will have 13 tracks â€” more than any of his previous albums. Though no further details on the albumâ€™s tracklist are available yet, the 'Watermelon Sugar' singer did unveil the Harryâ€™s House cover art: a photo of a confused-looking Harry scratching his face as he stands on the ceiling of an upside-down living room.

Trailer Teaser and Dedicated Page

Styles also released a 40-second trailer for the new album, wherein he walks pensively onto a theater stage and smiles into the camera as the outline of a yellow house rises above him.

The 28-year-old pop starâ€™s announcement confirms the theories of some of his detective-eyed fans, who noticed heâ€™d followed social media accounts titled You Are Home. They also discovered a mysterious website YouAreHome.co, which shows nothing but a beige door that updates every day to open up and show a different image when you hover over it (doesnâ€™t work well on mobile).

As of the album announcement, the door has changed to the Harryâ€™s House cover art.

Harryâ€™s House follows 2019â€™s Fine Line â€” for which he just finished up his world tour â€” and his 2017 self-titled debut album

My Thoughts...

I was in class when my friend sent me the instagram post Harry announced the release of his new album. Although, I had been anticipating that he was going to release something soon, like a music video, because of what the Harry accounts that I follow were posting about some speculations and he had been filming a music video in London, but I was not waiting for that new release to be a whole album! The cover of the album is just soooo pretty, itâ€™s the best one so far, but I donâ€™t know how I feel about the name of the albumâ€¦ itâ€™s the second album where he has included his name in an album and it just makes him look like heâ€™s full of himselfâ€¦

As we wait for the new release, here are some fan reactionâ€™s to the announcements:

title: ğŸ‘¦ğŸ»Harry Styles' Eras In the Last 12 YearsğŸ‘¨ğŸ»
snippet: Harry has grown up from a teenager to a full grown man in the public eye. Iâ€™m going to take you on a journey spanning through all Harry Stylesâ€™ hair and fashion trends
content:
Tickets and Arriving to the Arena

One month before when Harry was supposed to come to Vancouver, I had gotten tickets in pretty good seats through Craigslist, where I had to scrutinize each adâ€™s credibility. But finally, on the day of the concert, I was putting together my outfit, and I practically had like 4 hours of sleep because I was so One month before when Harry was supposed to come to Vancouver, I had gotten tickets in pretty good seats through Craigslist, where I had to scrutinize each adâ€™s credibility. But finally, on the day of the concert, I was putting together my outfit, and I practically had like 4 hours of sleep because I was so excited to see him perform live. Like every kilometre I got closer to the arena (Rogers Arena), I remember that my heart would beat faster and like I was getting nervous cause I had high expectations. I didnâ€™t encounter any problems from my home to the seats we purchased, so it much pretty much perfect, and I had no stress. Kacey Musgraves opened for him; although I didnâ€™t know much about her, I still enjoyed it, and I believe she was singing her songs from her album Golden Hour which won like 4 Grammys. After she left the stage, songs were playing background like One Direction â€œOliviaâ€ and The Beatlesâ€™ â€œHey Judeâ€, and everyone was just singing and dancing to it or waiting around as they set the stage for Harry to enter.

Harry Enters

Finally, after like 30 minutes, they dimmed the lights, and everyone just started screaming. At this point, I would say my heart rate was at a solid 120. As soon as the angelic intro of â€œOnly Angelâ€ started playing, the monitor blocking the stage began to lift to the ceiling with stage lights shining towards the audience, and you can just see Harryâ€™s silhouette standing before he starts singing. When I saw his silhouette, my knees were about to melt, like they started shaking like crazy, and it didnâ€™t help that everyone was like crying and/or wooing, and I was holding my phone filming all of it, so the camera was shaky. As soon as he started singing, my brain was just so overwhelmed by how good his voice sounded on the speakers, like it sounded amazing. I could feel the musicâ€™s bass shake the floor and feel it through my body (I would place a video playing one of songs, but WordPress only allows 2 Mb files, like WHY??).

Rest of the Concert

After he finished the first song, my knees got better, and I enjoyed every song after that. At one point, he oAfter he finished the first song, my knees got better, and I enjoyed every song after that. At one point, he only plays his guitar with no other music and starts singing and playing â€œIf I Could Flyâ€ by One Direction, which touched my soul. He made it sound so sad, and then he sang â€œJust A Little Bit of Your Heartâ€ by Ariana Grande, which he had written and passed it to her, which sounded terrific and probably preferred the way he sang it. The other great cover he did was â€œThe Chainâ€ by Fleetwood Mac, which many people started headbanging to. The audience was so engaged that it made the whole experience 100 times better. When â€œSign of the Timesâ€ was starting, everyone prior had passed on little red stickers that are somewhat see-through, so placed it on top of their phoneâ€™s flashlight so when he began singing, everyoneâ€™s flashlight shined red, and others white that looked so pretty, and the drums beat sounded so good. At the end of the show, I wanted to get some memorabilia, but all his merchandise was overpriced, and it just wasnâ€™t worth it, so I found some metal nut that resembled a ring, and I just kept that as my memorabilia, and I wore it for like 2 years until I lost it which was a sad day. The next day after the concert, my throat was sore from the screaming and wooing, but Iâ€™ll never forget that day.

title: ğŸ¤·Things You Probably Didnâ€™t Know About Harry StylesğŸ¤·
snippet: There are some news about the star that is shown in trending news, but Iâ€™ll be sharing some facts that some people who donâ€™t know Harry wouldnâ€™t know about, until nowâ€¦
content:
There are some people who donâ€™t more about the star than what is shown in trending news, but Iâ€™ll be sharing some facts that some people who donâ€™t know Harry wouldnâ€™t know about, until now. And potentially, some facts here will give you a different view of the musician. So here are 20 things you likely didnâ€™t know about the pop sensation.

  1. 1. During an interview during quarantine, he shared that one food he canâ€™t live without is bread. â€œYouâ€™re like, â€˜Oh, I think Iâ€™m hungry again. Oh, no, I ate lunch 25 minutes ago.â€™ My weakness has been bread. For breakfast, I had bread. And then, at lunch, I had bread. Then I had a snack before dinner, which was bread. And then I had some bread for dinnerâ€.
  2. 2. Before he auditioned to go on X-Factor, he shared that he was considering pursuing either to be a physiotherapist or a lawyer.
  3. 3. He enjoys romantic comedies. In his first album, the first lyric for Woman says, â€œShould we just search romantic comedies on Netflix and then see what we find?â€. He has reportedly said one of his favourite movies is â€œThe Notebook.â€
  4. 4. Although he is a great singer & songwriter, he also has some hidden talents like Juggling, playing the Kazoo, and speaking french. Search it on YouTube and see what you can find.
  5. 5. In September 2018, Harry turned his hand to modelling, taking part in a campaign for Gucci where he cuddled up to various adorable farmyard animals. Cute!
  6. 6. Harry has FOUR NIPPLES. In addition to the normal pair, he has two tiny ones further down his chest.
  7. 7. He had cut his hair for acting in Dunkirk, but he donated his locks to The Little Princess Trust. This organizationâ€™s website offers wigs made out of natural hair to children and young adults.
  8. 8. In October 2020, Harry sent the Internet into meltdown again when he was spotted with shorter hair, similar to his look in 2017 for his role in Dunkirk!
  9. 9. Harry made Vogue History in December 2020 when he was the first man to appear solo on the cover of the American magazine.
  10. 10. Harry has become an avid reader. â€œReading didnâ€™t really use to be my thing. I had such a short attention span,â€ he said. â€œBut I was dating someone who gave me some books; I felt like I had to read them because sheâ€™d think I was a dummy if I didnâ€™t read them.â€ Styles added that Haruki Murakamiâ€™s â€œNorwegian Woodâ€ was the first book he couldnâ€™t put down and sparked his interest in the hobby.
  11. 11. When Harry Styles first met Stevie Nicks backstage after a Fleetwood Mac show, he gave her a carrot cake for her birthday.
  12. 12. Harryâ€™s old school band, White Eskimo, performed in several talent shows and even at a wedding.
  13. 13. Harry co-wrote â€œJust a Little Bit of Your Heartâ€ specifically for Ariana Grande to perform. In 2014, Ariana told MTV she â€œwas like cryingâ€ the first time she heard the song â€œJust A Little Bit of Your Heartâ€, which is on Grandeâ€™s album â€œMy Everything.â€ Styles also penned the romantic ballad â€œSomedayâ€ with Meghan Trainor, and it appeared on Michael BublÃ©â€™s 2016 album.
  14. 14. His life inspired a sitcom! When Harry started making it big in One Direction, he lived in the attic of pal Ben Winston and Benâ€™s wife, Meredith, for nearly two years. The odd arrangement inspired the short-lived CBS comedy series â€œHappy Togetherâ€ starring Damon Wayans Jr. and Amber Stevens West. Felix Mallard played the character inspired by Harry.

title: âœˆï¸Travel Around The Worldâœˆï¸
snippet: Harry so far has gone on to two world tours for each of his albums. Details on the setlist and special guests are shared
content:
Harry so far has gone on to two tours, last one being sort of messy with the dates and locations because of the Covid-19 pandemic.

Harry Styles: Live on Tour

Harry Stylesâ€™ first headlining tour. The tour commenced on March 11, 2018 in Basel, Switzerland and concluded on July 13, 2018 in Los Angeles, California. Dates for each location were released for North and South America, Europe, Asia, and Oceania.

Setlist

  1. Only Angel
  2. Woman
  3. Ever Since New York
  4. wo Ghosts
  5. Carolina
  6. Stockholm Syndrome (One Direction song)
  7. Just a Little Bit of Your Heart (Ariana Grande cover)
  8. Medicine
  9. Meet Me in the Hallway
  10. Sweet Creature
  11. If I Could Fly (One Direction song)
  12. Anna
  13. What Makes You Beautiful (One Direction song)
  14. Sign of the Times
  15. From the Dining Table
  16. The Chain (Fleetwood Mac cover)
  17. Kiwi

Charity Work

The tour raised a $1.2 million in charity donations from ticket and merchandise sales for 62 charities around the world.

Harry Styles: Live on Tour

is his second headlining tour, launched in support of his second studio album, Fine Line. After being postponed twice due to the COVID-19 pandemic, the tour began on September 4, 2021 in Las Vegas, Nevada, consisting of 39 announced dates in total. It became one of the first full capacity indoor arena concerts to happen in the United States after the pandemic. Continuing his tour outside of the U.S, he has extended now to Europe and Latin America for 2022.

Setlist

  1. Golden
  2. Carolina
  3. Adore You
  4. Only Angel
  5. She
  6. Two Ghosts / Falling
  7. Sunflower, Vol.6
  8. Woman
  9. Cherry
  10. Lights Up
  11. Canyon Moon
  12. Treat People with Kindness
  13. What Makes You Beautiful (One Direction song)
  14. Fine Line
  15. Sign of the Times
  16. Watermelon Sugar
  17. Kiwi

title: ğŸ¶Ranking One Direction Albums ğŸ¶
snippet: Some sacrifices will be madeâ€¦ but a positive twist is Iâ€™ll share my fav song from each album
content:
Iâ€™d say Iâ€™ve listened to about 85% of the songs One Direction had released just because I judged the first 15 seconds of the song, and if I didnâ€™t like it, I would skip to the chorus, and if I still didnâ€™t like it, I completely ignored that song. So, I canâ€™t say I can adequately rank the albums, but Iâ€™m still gonna do it (idc). Iâ€™m ranking these from least favourite to best. Iâ€™m also going to be picking my favourite (no singles) song of each album (but most likely, I had 1-4 favourites, so Iâ€™m going to have to make some sacrifices). Letâ€™s get this party started!

#5 â€“ Up All Night

Given that this was their first album, all the songs sound the same to me. I got tired of WMYB to the point where Iâ€™m just annoyed that anytime One Direction is mentioned, people automatically start singing that song

Favourite: Gotta Be You

#4 â€“ Take Me Home

Thereâ€™s not much to say other than I find myself singing some of the catchy songs from this album like â€œKiss Youâ€ and â€œI Wouldâ€ and the overall mix of songs were better than the last one.

Favourite: Câ€™mon Câ€™mon (Harryâ€™s vocals in this ğŸ¤¯)

#3 â€“ Midnight Memories

Here is where I believe their music really took off. Harry actually wrote his first song here, â€œHappilyâ€, a pretty good bop. For sure, I have many favourites in this album that are just super upbeat. I live for Zaynâ€™s high notes on â€œYou and Iâ€ and â€œRight Nowâ€. Love, love, and love it!

Favourite: Through the Dark

#2 â€“ Made in the A.M

The overall sound of the album sounded very mature, and not sure if the maturer-me just prefers it because of that, or else I would think Midnight Memories is #2. It ranges from sad songs like â€œI Want to Write You a Songâ€, â€œInfinityâ€ or â€œIf I Could Flyâ€ that are just calming, or when Iâ€™m in a dancing/grooving mood, â€œOliviaâ€ or â€œWhat a Feelingâ€ are great. The only bad thing is, DJ Malik had â€œzaynedâ€ ğŸ˜¥

Favourite: What A Feeling

#1 â€“ Four

This album for sure had more bops that I think possibly anyone who listens to it can leave with one song being stuck in their head. Beautiful harmonies are heard in â€œOnce in a Lifetimeâ€ and â€œIllusionâ€ which I adore. There are only 2 songs I donâ€™t like, so that about sums up how this ended up being my favourite album. Best songs to dance/groove to are â€œAct my Ageâ€, â€œGirl Almightyâ€, and â€œNo Controlâ€. And here is where Niall sung, â€œwe took a chonceâ€.

title: ğŸ¥‰Lost In X-Factor, But Won Our HeartsğŸ†
snippet: After One Direction was eliminated in the X-Factor, no one foresaw what would happen nextâ€¦
content:
After One Direction came in 3rd in the X-Factor, Simon Cowell was willing enough to sponsor them to continue their careers as singers. They released their debut track â€œWhat Makes You Beautifulâ€ (that has now reached over 1 Billion views) and it premiered at No.28 on the Billboard Hot 100 Singles. After this, they went on to create their first debut album â€œUp All Nightâ€ and they became household names in the U.K, U.S, and beyond. The popular song became so impactful that they found themselves on the biggest of international stages when they performed â€œWhat Makes You Beautifulâ€ at the closing ceremony o the 2012 Summer Olympics in London. They then released â€œTake Me Homeâ€, â€œMidnight Memoriesâ€, â€œFourâ€, and â€œMade in the A.Mâ€. After 5 years together, the band announced their â€œhiatusâ€(itâ€™s been 7 years!!) and each one pursued their solo careers.

In 2016, Harry signed a solo contract with Columbia Records and released his self-titled debut album 11 months later to critical acclaim, and later embarked on a world tour (I was lucky enough to attend). Through this time however of his first release of his set-titled album, he was relatively not as big as Justin Bieber or Shawn Mendes, but only after his sophomore album, â€œFine Lineâ€ came out in late 2019, his hit singles hit a different chord in the world. Two of his songs, â€œWatermelon Sugar and â€œAdore Youâ€

3.9 Billion Streams (as of 2021)

7.4 Billion Streams (as of 2021)

This only means that his popularity as a solo artist will continue to climb to the charts. (as of right now [March 2022], #67 most listened artist on Spotify).
